verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>, when he changed <WH8138> his behaviour <WH2940> before <WH6440> Abimelech <WH40>; who drove him away <WH1644>, and he departed <WH3212>. I will bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068> at all times <WH6256>: his praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth <WH6310>.
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> in the LORD <WH3068>: the humble <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> thereof, and be glad <WH8055>.
O magnify <WH1431> the LORD <WH3068> with me, and let us exalt <WH7311> his name <WH8034> together <WH3162>.
I sought <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068>, and he heard <WH6030> me, and delivered <WH5337> me from all my fears <WH4035>.
They looked <WH5027> unto him, and were lightened <WH5102>: and their faces <WH6440> were not ashamed <WH2659>.
This poor man <WH6041> cried <WH7121>, and the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him, and saved <WH3467> him out of all his troubles <WH6869>.
The angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> encampeth <WH2583> round about <WH5439> them that fear <WH3373> him, and delivereth <WH2502> them.
O taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that the LORD <WH3068> is good <WH2896>: blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that trusteth <WH2620> in him.
O fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068>, ye his saints <WH6918>: for there is no want <WH4270> to them that fear <WH3373> him.
The young lions <WH3715> do lack <WH7326>, and suffer hunger <WH7456>: but they that seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> shall not want <WH2637> any good <WH2896> thing.
Come <WH3212>, ye children <WH1121>, hearken <WH8085> unto me: I will teach <WH3925> you the fear <WH3374> of the LORD <WH3068>.
What man <WH376> is he that desireth <WH2655> life <WH2416>, and loveth <WH157> many days <WH3117>, that he may see <WH7200> good <WH2896>?
Keep <WH5341> thy tongue <WH3956> from evil <WH7451>, and thy lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> guile <WH4820>.
Depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>, and do <WH6213> good <WH2896>; seek <WH1245> peace <WH7965>, and pursue <WH7291> it.
The eyes <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> are upon the righteous <WH6662>, and his ears <WH241> are open unto their cry <WH7775>.
The face <WH6440> of the LORD <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> evil <WH7451>, to cut off <WH3772> the remembrance <WH2143> of them from the earth <WH776>.
The righteous cry <WH6817>, and the LORD <WH3068> heareth <WH8085>, and delivereth <WH5337> them out of all their troubles <WH6869>.
The LORD <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto them that are of a broken <WH7665> heart <WH3820>; and saveth <WH3467> such as be of a contrite <WH1793> spirit <WH7307>.
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous <WH6662>: but the LORD <WH3068> delivereth <WH5337> him out of them all.
He keepeth <WH8104> all his bones <WH6106>: not one <WH259> of them <WH2007> is broken <WH7665>.
Evil <WH7451> shall slay <WH4191> the wicked <WH7563>: and they that hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be desolate <WH816>.
The LORD <WH3068> redeemeth <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants <WH5650>: and none of them that trust <WH2620> in him shall be desolate <WH816>.
